full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,PHUG LUGS RTZIS KYI LEGS BSHAD MKHAS PA'I MGUL RGYAN BEEd'UR DKAR PO'I DO SHAL DPYOD LDAN SNYING NOR LAS BAG RTZIS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @035B (CES PHUG LUGS RTZIS KYI LEGS BSHAD MKHAS PA'I MGUL RGYAN BEEd'UR DKAR PO'I DO SHAL DPYOD LDAN SNYING NOR LAS, ,BAG RTZIS 'DI 'GYUR 'GO RE RER MA ZAD PHYIS KYING MKHAS PA RES BAG RTZIS RE MDZAD PA'I MING GI RNAM GRANGS MI GCIG SHIN TU MANG BA DANG, ,DON YANG MI GCIG PA NYI SHU LHAG MTHONG BAR BYUNG BA RNAMS KYI 'BRAS BU DANG BCOS SOGS BOD DU BYAS PA'I BSTAN BCOS KYI RIGS RGYUD KYI GO BA LON MIN SNA TSOGS RNAMS KYANG TSANG MA 'DIN BAG RTZIS RENG DU PUSTA KA GCIG TU BCAD RUNG MKHA DBANG DPAL MGON 'PHRIN LAS PA'I BDE LEGS KUN 'BYUNG LA GZHI BCOL DE NYID LA YANG BYUR THAG NYI SHU SOGS DKRUGS PA DANG SPAS PA'I MTSANG BA RNAMS RTZA 'GREL DANG 'GYUR 'GO GZHAN GYI RGYUD NAS KHA BKANG, ,GZHAN YANG RGYA PHRUG DKON RIN GYI RIN CHEN KUN DUS, ,SPUG STON GYI RGYUD LUNG KUN DUS, ,SNYAN GROD PA'I DPAG BSAM LJON SHING, DE'I GSAL BYED SHUN WAGS 'GREL PA LJON SHING MDZES RGYAN GSAL BA'I ME LONG RIN CHEN 'PHRENG BA RNAMS @036A *, ,NAS MGAL CHAR MI 'GRO BA'I RIGS KYI LEGS CHA DU MA NAS BRGYAN TE BGYIS PA RNAMS BRTZI DUS MA LUS KHYAD RDEL GRANGS SU BSGRIGS PAS DON TSAN YAS MAS SU 'THOR BA RNAMS SO SO'I SDE TSAN DU BSGRIL BA'I SA DPYAD GSUM DU BSDUS, ,RIN CHEN SPUNGS PA NAS BSHAD PA'I KHAM YU ROG MO DANG 'BYUNG BA RIN CHEN KUN 'DUS NAS GSUNGS PA'I KHRI SGO BCU GNYIS RNAMS SO SOR GSIL NA ZIL CHES PAS RANG TSAN DU BZHAG STE BGYIS PA'I LE'U STE NYER GSUM PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAM, ,)
